common.title: FileToQR
common.description: Convert files and generate QR codes directly in your browser without uploading to any server

meta.description: File conversion and QR code generation platform. Convert images, documents, audio and more, and create customized QR codes.
meta.keywords: file conversion, QR code, image conversion, document conversion, online conversion, free conversion, PNG, JPG, PDF

footer.description: Convert files and generate QR codes directly in your browser without uploading to any server.

hero.title: Easily Convert Files to QR Codes
hero.subtitle: Convert files and generate QR codes directly in your browser without server uploads

conversion.description: Supports conversion between various file formats. Easily convert images, documents, audio, video, and data files.

formats.image: Image conversion (PNG, JPG, WebP, GIF, SVG, etc.)
formats.data: Data conversion (CSV, JSON, YAML, XML, etc.)

qrcode.description: Easily create customizable QR codes. Supports various content formats.
qrcode.content: Various content types: URL, text, contact, Wi-Fi, etc.
qrcode.formats: Various output formats: PNG, SVG, PDF, etc.

privacy.title: Privacy Focused
privacy.description: All file processing happens in your browser, so files are never sent to external servers.

usability.title: User-Friendly
usability.description: Intuitive interface and simple operation make it easy for anyone to convert files and generate QR codes.

versatility.title: Various Format Support
versatility.description: Support for images, documents, audio, data, and more allows you to handle all your conversion needs in one place.

secure.title: Security Focused
secure.description: Files are never uploaded to any server, keeping your information safe

fast.title: Fast Conversion
fast.description: Utilizes the latest web technologies for quick processing

easy.title: Easy to Use
easy.description: Complete your tasks with just a few clicks, no complex setup required

convert.title: File Conversion
convert.dropzone: Drag and drop files here or click to select

text.label: Text
text.hint: Up to 7,089 digits or 4,296 alphanumeric characters.

file.label: Select File
file.limit_hint: Only files up to 5MB can be converted to QR code.
file.name: File Name:
file.warning: Files converted to QR code are suitable for small files due to size limits. Large files will be split into multiple QR codes.

preview.placeholder: The generated QR code will be displayed here.

file_recovery.title: File Recovery Mode
file_recovery.description: Scan QR code to restore original file. First scan the metadata QR code, then scan the rest of the chunks in order.
file_recovery.metadata: Scan the metadata QR code first.
file_recovery.complete: All QR codes scanned! You can download the file now.

scan.label: How to Make a Scannable QR Code
scan.desc: For best scan results, ensure sufficient contrast between the QR code and background, and set the error correction level to 'High'.

logo.label: Tips for Adding a Logo
logo.desc: When adding a logo, use only the center area of the QR code and set the error correction level to 'High' or 'Very High'.

print.label: QR Code for Printing
print.desc: For printed materials, download the QR code as SVG to maintain quality when resizing.

test.label: QR Code Testing
test.desc: Before use, test the QR code with multiple devices and scanner apps to ensure proper recognition.
